data.name: Ash of Gods - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
All the tracks written by Adam Skorupa and Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz, famous composers, which used to work for such projects as The Witcher series, Painkiller, Call of Juarez, Eve Online etc.

Every track was recorded live by professional musicians, often using traditional instruments rarely encountered in contemporary recordings. All songs available with covers, credits and full meta tags.

TRACK LIST


01 Terminum
02 The Last Stand
03 Gem in the Mountains
04 Shadows of the Past
05 Legions on March
06 Burning Inside
07 The Last Bastions
08 Winds of Berkana
09 Ready Your Axe!
10 Everything We Lost
11 Harbingers of Death
12 I Can't Leave Her!
13 The Highlanders' Waltz
14 The Son of the Shadow Clan
15 A Blow is Struck
16 The Northern Winds are Coming
17 On the Edge of the Plains
18 Fight Your Fear
19 A Path through the Ashes
20 Turn the Wheel
21 Taste of the Abyss
22 Flame in Your Hands
23 Enlightenment
24 The Echo of the Fallen (Bonus)
25 Reet's Song (Bonus)

CREDITS


Music composed by: Adam Skorupa, Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz.
Additional Music: Michal Cielecki.
Vocals: Magdalena Przychodzka, Liz Katrin, Milosz Sienkiewicz, Pawel Szymiczek, Evgeniy Kostritsa, Aleksander Grochocki.
Additional vocals: Adam Skorupa, Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz.
Instrumentalists: Katarzyna Kamer, Bart Palyga, Krzysztof Szmytke, Aleksander Grochocki, Adam Skorupa, Pawel Betley, Milosz Sienkiewicz

data.short_description: Beautiful Ash of Gods soundtrack written by Adam Skorupa and Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz, composers of The Witcher series, Call of Juarez, Eve Online, Painkiller and other famous titles. Every track was recorded live by professional musicians, often using traditional instruments rarely encountered in contemporary recordings.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 МБ
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 Мб)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 (512MB) / ATI Radeon HD 2900 (512MB)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66GHz / AMD Phenom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) / ATI Radeon HD 5850 (1GB)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
